channel.title: Need help quick
channel.description: Hi my friend just downloaded czar source, and he's owner and I'm admin.. we did ::master and we're both maxed out.. But we can't go to the member area by clicking on the portal.. it says we're not members.. and we can't weild any of the member items.. Can somebody tell me how to fix this that'd be ownage thanks :)

item.title: Need help quick
item.dc:creator: @desiprince desiprince
item.description:
@desiprince wrote:

… make ur self a member if u dont know how to make member just go to ur data file on the and click on members then put ur name in it and click exit and save but make sure u log when u make ur self a member do that same thing if u want to make other ppl member put there name on the member list and kick them twice

Read full topic

item.title: Need help quick
item.dc:creator: @by_by_noob by by noob
item.description:
@by_by_noob wrote:

Or you can just go to characters and click members and type in your username =]

Read full topic

item.title: Need help quick
item.dc:creator: @hat_trix hat trix
item.description:
@hat_trix wrote:

go to the char. folder. find your characters, open them up, and find where it says something like ismember 0 and change that to 1. or go into your client.java, get the portal number from game. and search for case: "portal number" and then it should have something that says like “ismember = true;” or “isMember = 1;” just delete that line or make it false or 0. im not exactly sure what it says exactly because i would have to open up my project czar and look at it

Read full topic
